extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • createAndQuery

        public static Query createAndQuery(Query[] queries,
                   Map<String,Object> extendedOptions)
        Creates an AND query
        Parameters:
        queries - 2 or more queries to combine into an AND query.
        extendedOptions - provide extended options as a map from the extended option names to values. This may be an empty map.
        Returns:
        the generated AND query object

      • createOrQuery

        public static Query createOrQuery(Query[] queries,
                  Map<String,Object> extendedOptions)
        Creates an OR query
        Parameters:
        queries - 2 or more queries to combine into an OR query.
        extendedOptions - provide extended options as a map from the extended option names to values. This may be an empty map.
        Returns:
        the generated OR query object

      • createBrowseQuery

        public static BasicSearchQuery createBrowseQuery()
        Creates a browse query that will return all documents in the database folder, excluding any child database folders.
        Returns:
        the generated browse query object
        See Also:
        createQuery(String)

      • createQuery

        public static BasicSearchQuery createQuery(String query)
        Creates a query based on the provided query string. The query will return all documents matching the given query string, including those and any child database folders.
        Parameters:
        query - the query string
        Returns:
        the generated query object
        See Also:
        createBrowseQuery()

      • createExtendedQuery

        public static BasicSearchQuery createExtendedQuery(String query,
                                   Map<String,Object> extendedOptions)
        This creates a query with extended options (stored in a map as key/value combinations)
        Parameters:
        query - the query string
        extendedOptions - provide extended options as a map from the extended option names to values. This may be an empty map.
        Returns:
        the generated query object.

      • createFieldQuery

        public static Query createFieldQuery(DocumentField field,
                     Condition condition,
                     Object value)
        This creates a query to see if a given field value matches a condition. This method only applies for conditions that require one parameter. For conditions that require multiple parameters (for example Condition.IN_RANGE use createFieldQuery(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.DocumentField, com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.Condition, Object[]) instead.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to search
        condition - the condition to apply when searching this field
        value - the value to apply to the condition
        Returns:
        the generated query object.

      • createFieldQuery

        public static Query createFieldQuery(DocumentField field,
                     Condition condition,
                     Object[] values)
        This creates a query to see if a given field value matches a condition. This method only applies for conditions that require multiple parameters (for example Condition.IN_RANGE. For conditions that require single parameters (for example Condition.EQUAL use createFieldQuery(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.DocumentField,com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.Condition,Object) instead.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to search
        condition - the condition to apply when searching this field
        values - the values to apply to the condition
        Returns:
        the generated query object.

      • createFieldQuery

        public static Query createFieldQuery(DocumentField field,
                     Condition condition,
                     Object[] values,
                     Map<String,Object> extendedOptions)
        This creates a query to see if a given field value matches a condition.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to search
        condition - the condition to apply when searching this field
        values - the values to apply to the condition
        extendedOptions - provide extended options as a map from the extended option names to values. This may be an empty map.
        Returns:
        the generated query object.
